entry.title: Taproot NACK
entry.summary: The email thread starts with a message from KING JAMES HRMH of Great British Empire and MR. Damian A. James Williamson, discussing the operation of consensus and censorship resistance of Bitcoin. The email includes links to Willtech and other projects, as well as contact information for Damian. The thread then continues with a response from ZmnSCPxj to a previous message about a troll on the Bitcoin Protocol Discussion list. ZmnSCPxj suggests that it may be useful to at least answer the troll naively as if it were an honest question, depending on the topic raised. However, he also notes that discussing the "lordship" and "majesty" of the troll in this particular topic is inane and largely moot, given the irrelevance of claims to nobility or aristocracy.
